short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send messages to Social hub console

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for sending messages and users details from any website to the desktop application SocialHub. This application allows to send messages or texts from Chrome web page to Social Hub application. To use this application, you need to buy Social Hub on Axel Technology web site.
